mapper.insert: insert into t_user( username, password, gender, phone, email, avator, uuid, create_user, create_time, modified_user, modified_time ) values( #{username}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{avator}, #{uuid}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: select id, username, password, gender, phone, email, avator, uuid, create_user as createUser, create_time as createTime, modified_user as modifiedUser, modified_time as modifiedTime from t_user where username=#{username}

select id, username, password, gender, phone, email, avator, uuid, create_user as createUser, create_time as createTime, modified_user as modifiedUser, modified_time as modifiedTime from t_user where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_user set password=#{password}, modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} where id=#{id}

update t_user set
avator=#{avator},
username=#{username},
gender=#{gender},
phone=#{phone},
email=#{email},
modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} where id=#{id}
